title: Aseptic Compounding Practice Course Based on Constructivist Scaffolding (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical theory and laboratory safety protocols
context.additional_context: Learners receive pre-learning content via LMS and acquire aseptic compounding techniques step-by-step using virtual simulation tools and video materials. They participate in practical assessments (media fill, glove finger sampling, etc.) via personal devices

learning_goals: Perform the five basic hygiene techniques required for aseptic compounding with 90% accuracy.
Design sterile preparation strategies applicable to real healthcare settings through critical thinking.
Complete aseptic technique practice with an 80%+ success rate based on checklist-based evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
